message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $155.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $130?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $140.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $125?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing money on the deal. I'm counteroffering at $132.50
I'm starting to think we're close, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $120?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $120, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at the middle of $120 and my previous offer, so I'm counteroffering at $125.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $115?
